lore: {"text":"The Voracious Spider is a spider that spawns in","color":"gray"}
{"text":"the Spider's Den. Unlike regular spiders in the Den","color":"gray"}
{"text":"they have much more health and damage output","color":"gray"}
{"text":"and spawn much more frequently in large groups.","color":"gray"}
